snippet: Jeremy Lin scored 19 of his 25 points in Charlotte's big second quarter, carrying the Hornets to a 114-100 win over the Boston Celtics on Monday night....
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin scored 19 of his 25 points in Charlotte's big second quarter, carrying the Hornets to a 114-100 win over the Boston Celtics on Monday night.

headline.main: Lin Has 25 Points to Send Hornets to 114-100 Rout Over Celts
headline.print_headline: Lin Has 25 Points to Send Hornets to 114-100 Rout Over Celts
